Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near 53rd/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Southport and the Loop
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and the Loop due to a medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
UPDATE: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and the Loop due to a medical emergency.

As a result, Brown Line trains are operating only between Kimball and Southport at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Southport and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
